name: BitDasher
description:
BIT DASHER

You are left as the only survivor on the  Deep-space station Omega, with hordes of aliens attacking in order to gain control of the ship. You try to fight back but every time you do your sword breaks in half and flies across the room! 

*HOW TO PLAY*
You have to pick up your two sword pieces in order to combine your sword and finish off the enemies.
Every wave your sword breaks again, and you can get it back by collecting the two pieces.
Dashing with space bar makes you invulnerable and when you have the sword, colliding with enemies kills them instantly. Finish them all off to progress to the next wave!

There is a bug in Godot right now where sounds are super messed up, so if there are sound quality issues I apologize (I am working on a fix)

ANYONE CAN RATE FOR THE JAM HERE (Just make an account to rate): https://gamejam.com/jam/scorejam12/submissions/283387

Made in Godot for the ScoreSpace Jam.
